/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on analyzing COD when there is an uncharacterized discharge, separation or release, including
categories of uncharacterized separations
, and
instructions for handling cases involving a former service member with an uncharacterized separation
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B  - Special Topics Involving Character of Discharge
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
